      • getPosX

        java.lang.Float getPosX()
        Returns:
        the X coordinate of the Entity's position

        Setter for the position

        x - the position on the X coordinate of the Entity.

        Parameters:

      • setPosY

        void setPosY(float y)
        Setter for the position
        Parameters:

      • setPos

        void setPos(java.util.Vector<java.lang.Float> pos)
        Setter for the position
        Parameters:
        pos - the position of the Entity. Must be the X coordinate first and then the Y coordinate.

      • getDrawable

        javafx.scene.image.ImageView getDrawable()
        Getter for the sprite of the Entity
        Returns:
        the drawable image, that can be used in a javafx.scene

      • setDrawable

        void setDrawable(Resources res)
        Setter of the sprite for the Entity. In order for it to work properly, the resource must be loaded.
        Parameters:
        res - the name of the Resource with which the ImageView will be made.
